SubjectRegulations Amending Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS in order to extend temporary increases to available grants and loans for the 2025-2026 academic year.
